title: 3vs3 Team ENG Gold/plat
body:

replies.body:
Hi

Im 17, male. Im in SoloQ main supp, but can Play in 3v3 everything. my highest 3v3 Team was Gold 3-2.

i know about the stong picks and know her pros and contras. i know som compisitions or tactics. i watch some challenger gameplay, to get better in 3v3. i love this mode and i Think it makes really much fun.

i cant write english very good, but talk is no Problem :D

if you are intrested, please add me in skype (mischanebel) to Change TS IP or to discuss more Information :D
